decisions.description: Determines whether the Contact ID field of the record in Account from GetAccount has a value.
decisions.name: HaveContactId
decisions.label: Have Contact ID?

decisions.description: Determines whether a person account was found by checking if personAccountId has a value.
decisions.name: HavePersonAccount
decisions.label: Have Person Account?

decisions.description: Determines whether a person account record type ID was found by checking if the Record Type ID field in the Record Type from Get Person Account Record Type record variable has a value.
decisions.name: HavePersonAccountRecordTypeId
decisions.label: Have Person Account Record Type ID?

Flow.description: Duplicate version of the product delivered flow that contains a fix for the nonexistent field reference. Updated October 2025 LMC

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Stores the picklist choice set used in the EmployeeStatusPicklist screen component on the ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails2 screen. The object is set to Employee2, the data type is set to Picklist, and the field is set to EmployeeStatus.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ChoiceEmployeeStatus

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Stores the picklist choice set used in the EmployeeTypePicklist screen component on the ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails2 screen. The object is set to Employee2, the data type is set to Picklist, and the field is set to Employee Type.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ChoiceEmployeeType

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Stores the picklist choice set used in the EmploymentTypePicklist on the ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails2 screen. The object is set to Employee2, the data type is set to Picklist, and the field is set to EmploymentType.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ChoiceEmploymentType

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Stores record choice set used in the ChoiceLookupManager screen component on the ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails2 screen. This component shows contacts that are also person accounts. The choice label is set to Name and the choice value is set to Id.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ChoicePersonAccountContact

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Stores the picklist choice set used in the SalutationPicklist screen component on the ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails screen.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: ChoiceSalutation

Flow.label: Create Employee

recordCreates.description: Creates an account record using the information that the flow user entered in ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails and ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails2. Stores the Id of the new account record in the personAccountId variable.
recordCreates.name: CreateAccount
recordCreates.label: Create Person Account

recordCreates.description: Creates an employee2 record using the information that the flow user entered in the ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails and ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails2 screens. Stores the ID of the new employee2 record in the employeeId variable.
recordCreates.name: CreateEmployee2Record
recordCreates.label: Create Employee2 Record

recordLookups.description: Gets the account record with an ID that matches the personAccountId. Stores the result in the Account from GetAccount record variable.
recordLookups.name: GetAccount
recordLookups.label: Get Account

recordLookups.description: Gets a record type with SObjectType equal to Account and IsPersonType equal to True. Stores the result in the Record Type from GetRecordType record variable.
recordLookups.name: GetRecordType
recordLookups.label: Get Record Type

screens.description: Allows the flow user to specify the name, employee number, date of birth, contact details, and address details for the employee to be created.
screens.name: ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails
screens.label: Collect Employee Details

validationRule.errorMessage: Specify an employee number with a maximum of 20 characters.

screens.description: Allows the flow user to specify employment type, manager, and the employment status details for the employee to be created.
screens.name: ScreenCollectEmployeeDetails2
screens.label: Collect Employee Details

validationRule.errorMessage: Select a status end date that's on or after the status start date.

variables.description: Stores the ID of the employee2 record created by the flow. This value is available as output from the flow.
variables.name: employeeId

variables.description: Store Value of Manager Id that is nothing but Contact Id associated with Person Account.
variables.name: ManagerName

variables.description: Stores the ID of the account record created by the flow. This value is available as output from the flow.
variables.name: personAccountId
